name: movementengineer
description: Movement Engineer is a client-side tool for exploring, authoring, and comparing structured data about social movements using the Markdown v2.3 dataset format.

scripts.test: npm run test:legacy && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:legacy: node markdown-dataset-loader.test.js && node view-models.test.js && node comparison-services.test.js
